Articles.Content:
pretty simple thing really, and while I feel it has likely been suggested before (but is not on the already suggested thread so I'm safe)

Can all the "things" a module can do when you right click on it in space be available in the action group menu.

It just seems reasonable that if i can control said feature through endless mouse clicks of tiny, possibly rotating parts, that I could control them through the customizable single button interface that is already built into the game.
